name: Street Parkour
description:
THE GAME

Street Parkour is a challenging parkour game that takes place on streets. You will have to overcome obstacles by performing different stylish and well executed stunts. There are varieties of movement that can be categorized under: jumping, sliding, kicking, climbing, changing track, falling and tripping.

THE SCAN VERSION

You can put yourself in the game! More exactly your 3D scanned version that will play and execute the movement. As shown in the following video:

You just have to submit your pledge to our:  Kickstarter campaign (under the reward: "Hero Pack" ). All requirements and instructions are explained in our campaign... 

You are more than welcomed to send us your recommendation and comments. We gave high consideration to your feedback. 

It would mean the world to us if you can share our game within your friends and social media followers...
